SLogoFunction
A Function is a Token than extends SLogoRunnable and WorkspaceEntry.

An interface that marks an object as runnable and expects 0 or more parameters.
SLogoToken
Superclass of all possible tokens recognized by the Parser: Command, Variable, Constant, List, and Comment.
